text: Samasata Junction railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Samasata town, Bahawalpur district of Punjab province, Pakistan. The station served as the junction between the Karachi–Peshawar Railway Line and the now defunct Samasata–Amruka Branch Line (and onwards to the Bahawalnagar–Fort Abbas Branch Line). ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Bahawalpur District Category:Railway stations on Samasata–Amruka Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Samasata Junction railway station
